Mariama Mamane bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu  na injinia si Niger.
Mamane guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Jacigreen ma rite ọtụtụ ihe nrite ọhụrụ maka ọrụ ya iji melite ọnọdụ gburugburu osimiri.
A mụrụ Mamane n'aka nne nwere nzere masta na ndụ na sayensị ụwa.
Mamane tolitere n'akụkụ Osimiri Niger n'obodo ya bụ Niamey, ma na 2020 ọ bi na Burkina Faso. O nwere akara ugo mmụta na biodiversity na njikwa gburugburu ebe obibi na Mahadum Niamey.

N'afọ 2016, Mamane ritere ihe nrite Entrepreneurial Journey site na International Institute for Water and Environmental Engineering (nke a makwaara dị ka 2iE) wee guzobe ụlọ ọrụ Jacigreen ma debanye aha ya na Ouagadougou. Jacigreen na-arụ ọrụ iji gbanwee hyacinth na-awakpo n'ime fatịlaịza na compost na biogas. A na-eji biogas eme ihe na generators iji mepụta ọkụ eletrik.
N'afọ 2016, Mamane nwetakwara ihe nrite purụ iche nke ndị ọkacha mmasị na African Rethink Awards.
N'afọ 2017, e nyere Mamane onyinye United Nations Environment Programme  nke a kpọrọ Young Champions of the Earth Prize. Ihe nrite ahụ ruru $ 15,000.
